name: ciclos-dashboard
description: Dashboard interativo para análise de dados educacionais

scripts.build: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js && npm run minify-html
scripts.minify-js: terser script.js -o script.min.js --compress --mangle && terser analytics.js -o analytics.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.minify-html: html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js index.html -o index.min.html && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js dashboard.html -o dashboard.min.html && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js analise-nova.html -o analise-nova.min.html

author: Paulo
